page.title: 16An Older Ufton Resident
page.content: This resident has lived in the village for 71 years.She lives in a cottage which was originally a carpenters shop.Her family has lived there for 4 generations.She was educated at the village school but left when she was 14 years old.She used to earn 6d for cleaning out the hens at weekends.She is not happy with the bus service but she likes the clubs etc.She is a member of the over 60's club and the church council.She has no car and so she goes to the doctor in Leamington Spa by bus instead of Harbury. Other activities are,whist drives, garden fetes,coffee mornings. She remembers obtaining water from the well before it was piped in about 30 years ago.She still has her original kitchen range.
